# Download the package containing the penguins dataset:

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
install.packages("palmerpenguins")
```

# Load the dataset 'penguins'

```{r}
data("penguins", package = "palmerpenguins")
```

# Description of the dataset

```{r}
summary(penguins)
ncol(penguins)
nrow(penguins)
```
There are penguins' species,island and their bill length, bill depth, flipper length,body mass,sex,and year in the dataset. There are 8 columns and 344 rows. The mean of flipper length is 200.9 mm.
